@[trans]
theorem is_equivalent.trans {l : filter α} {u v w : α → β} (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v)
    (hvw : asymptotics.is_equivalent v l w) : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l w :=
  (huv.is_o.trans_is_O hvw.is_O).triangle hvw.is_o
#align is_equivalent.trans is_equivalent.trans
tendsto_nhds_iff:

theorem is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds_iff {c : β} (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) :
    tendsto u l ((nhds) c) ↔ tendsto v l ((nhds) c) :=
  ⟨huv.tendsto_nhds, huv.symm.tendsto_nhds⟩
#align is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds_iff is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds_iff
tendsto_nhds:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `exprℝ -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `nhds -/
theorem is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds {c : β} (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) (hu : tendsto u l ((nhds) c)) :
    tendsto v l ((nhds) c) := by
  by_cases h : c = 0
  · subst c
    rw [← is_o_one_iff (exprℝ)] at hu⊢
    simpa using (huv.symm.is_o.trans hu).add hu
  · rw [← is_equivalent_const_iff_tendsto h] at hu⊢
    exact huv.symm.trans hu
#align is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds is_equivalent.tendsto_nhds

theorem is_equivalent.tendsto_const {c : β} (hu : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l (const _ c)) : tendsto u l ((nhds) c) :=
  by
  rcases em <| c = 0 with ⟨rfl, h⟩
  · exact (tendsto_congr' <| is_equivalent_zero_iff_eventually_zero.mp hu).mpr tendsto_const_nhds
  · exact (is_equivalent_const_iff_tendsto h).mp hu

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/
theorem is_equivalent.tendsto_at_top [order_topology β] (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v)
    (hu : tendsto u l at_top) : tendsto v l at_top :=
  let ⟨φ, hφ, h⟩ := huv.symm.exists_eq_mul
  tendsto.congr' h.symm (mul_comm u φ ▸ hu.at_top_mul zero_lt_one hφ)

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `«expr • » -/
theorem is_equivalent.smul {α E 𝕜 : Type _} [normed_field 𝕜] [normed_add_comm_group E] [normed_space 𝕜 E] {a b : α → 𝕜}
    {u v : α → E} {l : filter α} (hab : asymptotics.is_equivalent a l b) (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) :
    asymptotics.is_equivalent (fun x => «expr • » (a x) (u x)) l fun x => «expr • » (b x) (v x) :=
  by
  rcases hab.exists_eq_mul with ⟨φ, hφ, habφ⟩
  have :
    «expr =ᶠ[ ] » ((fun x : α => «expr • » (a x) (u x)) - fun x : α => «expr • » (b x) (v x)) l fun x =>
      «expr • » (b x) («expr • » (φ x) (u x) - v x) :=
    by
    convert
      (habφ.comp₂ («expr • » · ·) <| eventually_eq.refl _ u).sub (eventually_eq.refl _ fun x => «expr • » (b x) (v x))
    ext
    rw [pi.mul_apply, mul_comm, mul_smul, ← smul_sub]
  refine' (is_o_congr this.symm <| eventually_eq.rfl).mp ((is_O_refl b l).smul_is_o _)
  rcases huv.is_O.exists_pos with ⟨C, hC, hCuv⟩
  rw [is_equivalent] at *
  rw [is_o_iff] at *
  rw [is_O_with] at hCuv
  simp only [metric.tendsto_nhds, dist_eq_norm] at hφ
  intro c hc
  specialize hφ (c / 2 / C) (div_pos (by linarith) hC)
  specialize huv (show 0 < c / 2 by linarith)
  refine' hφ.mp (huv.mp <| hCuv.mono fun x hCuvx huvx hφx => _)
  have key :=
    calc
      «expr‖ ‖» (φ x - 1) * «expr‖ ‖» (u x) ≤ c / 2 / C * «expr‖ ‖» (u x) :=
        mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_right hφx.le (norm_nonneg <| u x)
      _ ≤ c / 2 / C * (C * «expr‖ ‖» (v x)) := mul_le_mul_of_nonneg_left hCuvx (div_pos (by linarith) hC).le
      _ = c / 2 * «expr‖ ‖» (v x) := by
        field_simp [hC.ne.symm]
        ring
      
  calc
    «expr‖ ‖» (((fun x : α => «expr • » (φ x) (u x)) - v) x) = «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (φ x - 1) (u x) + (u x - v x)) := by
      simp [sub_smul, sub_add]
    _ ≤ «expr‖ ‖» («expr • » (φ x - 1) (u x)) + «expr‖ ‖» (u x - v x) := norm_add_le _ _
    _ = «expr‖ ‖» (φ x - 1) * «expr‖ ‖» (u x) + «expr‖ ‖» (u x - v x) := by rw [norm_smul]
    _ ≤ c / 2 * «expr‖ ‖» (v x) + «expr‖ ‖» (u x - v x) := add_le_add_right key _
    _ ≤ c / 2 * «expr‖ ‖» (v x) + c / 2 * «expr‖ ‖» (v x) := add_le_add_left huvx _
    _ = c * «expr‖ ‖» (v x) := by ring
    
#align is_equivalent.smul is_equivalent.smul

theorem is_equivalent_iff_tendsto_one
    (hz :
      «expr∀ᶠ in , » "./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:210:13: unsupported notation `«expr∀ᶠ in , »" l

    asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v ↔ ∃ (φ : α → β)(hφ : tendsto φ l ((nhds) 1)), «expr =ᶠ[ ] » u l (φ * v) :=

  rw [is_equivalent, is_o_iff_exists_eq_mul]

theorem is_equivalent_const_iff_tendsto {c : β} (h : c ≠ 0) :

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/
theorem is_equivalent.inv (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) :
    asymptotics.is_equivalent (fun x => (u x)⁻¹) l fun x => (v x)⁻¹ :=
  by
  rw [is_equivalent_iff_exists_eq_mul] at *
  rcases huv with ⟨φ, hφ, h⟩
  rw [← inv_one]
  refine' ⟨fun x => (φ x)⁻¹, tendsto.inv₀ hφ (by norm_num), _⟩
  convert h.inv
  ext

exists_eq_mul:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/

theorem is_equivalent.exists_eq_mul (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) :
    ∃ (φ : α → β)(hφ : tendsto φ l ((nhds) 1)), «expr =ᶠ[ ] » u l (φ * v) :=
  is_equivalent_iff_exists_eq_mul.mp huv

theorem is_equivalent.div (htu : asymptotics.is_equivalent t l u) (hvw : asymptotics.is_equivalent v l w) :
    asymptotics.is_equivalent (fun x => t x / v x) l fun x => u x / w x := by

congr_right:
/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/

theorem is_equivalent.congr_right {u v w : α → β} {l : filter α} (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v)
    (hvw : «expr =ᶠ[ ] » v l w) : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l w :=

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/

/- ./././Mathport/Syntax/Translate/Expr.lean:207:4: warning: unsupported notation `asymptotics.is_equivalent -/
theorem is_equivalent.congr_left {u v w : α → β} {l : filter α} (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v)
    (huw : «expr =ᶠ[ ] » u l w) : asymptotics.is_equivalent w l v :=

theorem is_equivalent.add_is_o (huv : asymptotics.is_equivalent u l v) (hwv : «expr =o[ ] » w l v) :

theorem is_o.add_is_equivalent (hu : «expr =o[ ] » u l w) (hv : asymptotics.is_equivalent v l w) :
